body_html: If you run python -m trace myscript.py from the Command Prompt, can you capture the last few lines of trace output? (Or does it crash the command prompt? In that case, something would have to be very broken....)
body_text: If you run python -m trace myscript.py from the Command Prompt, can you capture the last few lines of trace output? (Or does it crash the command prompt? In that case, something would have to be very broken....)
body: If you run `python -m trace myscript.py` from the Command Prompt, can you capture the last few lines of trace output? (Or does it *crash* the command prompt? In that case, something would have to be very broken....)
